name: Thunder
description:
In an isolated community that has lost all ties with modern technology, you have been appointed as Storm Hunter. As you face the fury of nature, steer your glider and catch lightning to fill your bunker's batteries.

Producer : Augustin DAGORET
Game designers : Amélie BAILLY, Pénélope CHARLES, Clémentine PLISSONNIER
2D/3D Artists : Juliette RUAUX, Aymeric THEVENOT
Sound designer : Florent CHARDEVEL
Programmers : Grégoire CARABEUFS, Olivier LAPOINTE, François RIVOIRE
UX Designers : Viviane BICABA, Hyebin PARK

More infos : thunderenjmin@gmail.com
